comment: Smart Data models - Geolocation schema derived from the open connectivity foundation repository https://github.com/openconnectivityfoundation/IoTDataModels adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.OCF/master/Geolocation/schema.json
description: This Resource describes the properties associated with the current geolocation coordinate.Geolocation is a geolocation coordinate data.The Property "latitude" is a device's current Latitude coordinate (degrees).The Property "longitude" is a device's current Longitude coordinate (degrees).The Property "alt" is a device's current distance (metres) above or below 'local' sea-level.The Property "accuracy" is the accuracy level of the latitude and longitude coordinates (metres).The Property "altitudeAccuracy" is

contents.name: accuracy
contents.comment: The accuracy level of the latitude and longitude coordinates (metres).

contents.name: alt
contents.comment: The current distance (metres) above or below 'local' sea-level.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: altitudeAccuracy
contents.comment: The accuracy level of the altitude coordinates (metres).

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: heading
contents.comment: The direction of travel of the Device (degree).

contents.name: latitude
contents.comment: The Device's Current Latitude coordinate (degrees).

contents.name: longitude
contents.comment: The Device's Current Longitude coordinate (degrees).

contents.name: n
contents.comment: Friendly name of the Resource

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: speed
contents.comment: The Device's current velocity (metres per second).

contents.name: if
contents.comment: The OCF Interface set supported by this Resource.

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: rt
contents.comment: The Resource Type.

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
